name: Lampong
description:
Controls:
W A S D - Move

--

Lampong’s vision is to promote and expose Philippine mythology to the market. This also includes providing entertainment to the users while offering them information.

The videogame “Lampong” will not only offer Philippine mythology exposure to inspire videogame developers to create different products promoting Philippine mythology, but Lampong also wants to spark the interest of the people when it comes to Philippine Mythology.

--
Developed on March 03, 2021
